entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:33 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 80 gusting to 100 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
